<script type="text/javascript" src="//nexus.ensighten.com/sherwin/Bootstrap.js"></script><style type="text/css">/* style resets */
#ensNotifyBanner {
    font-size: 14px !important;
    opacity: 1;
}
#ensNotifyBanner, #ensNotifyBanner *, #ensNotifyBanner *:before, #ensNotifyBanner *:after {
    -webkit-box-sizing: border-box !important;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    border-radius: 0;
    line-height: 19px;
    -webkit-transition: none !important;
    -o-transition: none !important;
    transition: none !important;
    margin: 0;
    min-height: 0 !important;
    min-width: 0 !important;
    max-height: none !important;
    max-width: none !important;
    padding: 0;
}
#ensNotifyBanner {
    -webkit-box-align: stretch;
    -ms-flex-align: stretch;
    align-items: stretch;
    bottom: 0;
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
    -ms-flex-direction: column;
    flex-direction: column;
    height: auto;
    left: 0 !important;
    margin: 0 !important;
    min-height: 80px !important;
    position: fixed !important;
    right: auto !important;
    top: auto !important;
    width: 100% !important;
}
#ensNotifyBanner{
    border: 1px solid #333;
    position: fixed;
    max-width: 60%;
    border: 1px solid #000;
    display: none;
    box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px grey;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 20px 0;
    z-index: 999999;
}

#ensNotifyBanner #ensBannerDescription {
    padding: 0 20px !important;
}
#ensNotifyBanner .ensBannerTitle{
    color: #0069af;
    margin-left:53%;
    font-size: 18px;
    padding: 0px 0px 10px;
}
#ensBannerDescription {
    font-size: 18px;
    color: #333;
    padding: 20px 20px 0px 20px;
    min-width: 400px;
    max-width: 400px;
    font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
    font-size: inherit;
}

#ensNotifyBanner #ensBannerDescription p {
    font-size: 18px;
    left: 0;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 9px 40px 0;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
}

#ensNotifyBanner p {
    color: #0069af;
    position: absolute;
    color: #222;
}

#ensNotifyBanner a {
    background: none;
    color: #0069af !important;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-weight: inherit;
    text-decoration: underline;
}

#ensNotifyBanner .ensButtons{
    float: none;
    margin: 0 !important;
    position: static;
    text-align: right;
    width: 100%;
}

#ensCloseBanner{
    display:none !important;
}

.bannerButtons {
    text-align: center;
    padding: 16px 0px 0px 0px!important;
}

.bannerButtons button {
    background: #0069af;
    color: white;
    padding: 6px !important;
    width: max-content;
    margin: 5px !important;
}

#ensNotifyBanner .ensButtons #ensCloseBanner {
    background-color: #0069af;
    color: #fff;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    height: 32px;
    line-height: 32px;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    position: static;
    top: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    margin: auto 20px;
}
#ensModalWrapper .consentDescription.consentDescription {color: #222;}
#ensModalWrapper .ensButtons .button.button.grey.grey {background-color: #666666;}
#ensModalWrapper .ensButtons .button.button.grey.grey:hover {background-color: #333;}
#ensModalWrapper .ensButtons .button.button.blue.blue {background-color: #0069af;}
#ensModalWrapper .ensButtons .button.button.blue.blue:hover {background-color: #004a7c;}
#ensModalWrapper #ensCancel{
    display: none !important;
}

/* section#ensModalWrapper {
    padding: 0 0 20px 0 !important;
    margin-left: 11.5%;
    left: 0 !important;
    line-height: 1.4 !important;
    overflow-y: scroll;
    max-height: 80%;
    top: 1px !important;
}*/

section#ensModalWrapper {
    font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif !important;
    top: 1% !important;
    left: unset !important;
    left: 50% !important;
    transform: translate(-50%, 0);
    overflow-y: scroll;
    max-height: 80%;
    padding-top: 0 !important;
}

.ensModal {
    padding: 0 9px 0 9px !important;
    font-size: 15.5px !important;
}

.ensModal .ensTitle {
    background: #FFFFFF !important;
    position: unset !important;
    color: #0069af !important;
    width: 100% !important;
}

.ensModal .consentDescription {
    font-size: 13.5px !important;
    padding-bottom: 8px;
}
/* .ensModal .description {
    max-width: 700px !important;
    font-size: 13px !important;
    margin-top: 0 !important;
} */

.ensModal .description {
    font-size: 13.5px !important;
    line-height: 1.4 !important;
    margin-top: 0 !important;
    clear: none !important;
    padding: 10px 0 !important;
    max-width: 90% !important;
}

.ensButtons {
    margin-top: unset !important;
}

button#ensSave {
    width: max-content;
}

.consentWidget {
    bottom: -8px !important;
    font-size: 11px !important;
    left: 5%;
    max-width: 280px;
    width: max-content;
    z-index: 999;
}

.consentWidget__text {
    padding: 8px 12px 14px 12px !important;
    float: none !important;
}

#ensConsentWidget {
    display: none;
}

.ensToggleRowWrapper {
    max-height: unset !important;
    padding: 8px 0;
}

.ensCenter {
    padding: 0 8px;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 1200px) {
    #ensNotifyBanner {
        left: 50% !important;
        margin-left: -600px !important;
        width: 1200px !important;
    }
}
@media screen and (min-width: 200px) and (max-width: 769px){
    #ensNotifyBanner .ensBannerTitle{
        text-align:center;
        margin-left:none !important;
        margin-left:none !important;
    }
    
    .ensModal .ensTitle{
        padding-left: 0% !important;
        padding-top:0px !important;
    }
    
    .ensToggleRow hr{
        margin-top:0px !important;
        margin-bottom: 0 !important;
    }
    .ensToggleRowWrapper {
        max-height: 360px !important;
    }

}

@media screen and (min-width: 500px) {

    /* medium screen e.g. ipad landscape */
    section#ensModalWrapper {
        width: 85%;
        max-width: 768px;
    }
}

@media screen and (min-width: 1200px) {

    /* large screen */
    section#ensModalWrapper {
        max-width: 1100px !important;
    }
}

@media screen and (min-width: 200px) and (max-width: 769px) {

    /* small screen */
    section#ensModalWrapper {
    	width: 90%;
    	max-height: 100%;
    }
    
    #ensModalWrapper .ensModal{
        height: 80vh; 
/*        overflow-y: auto;*/
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
    }
    
    .ensModal hr {
        display: none !important;
    }

    .ensToggleRowWrapper {
        max-height: 500px !important;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        order: 4;
    }
    
    .ensToggleRowWrapper a {
        display: none !important;
    }

    .ensTitle {
        font-size: 18px !important;
    }

    .ensModal .consentDescription {
        font-size: 12px !important;
        padding-top: 12px;
    }

    .ensModal .description {
        font-size: 12px !important;
        line-height: 1.4 !important;
    }

    .ensToggleLabel b {
        font-size: 13px !important;
    }
    
    .ensButtons {
        display: flex;
        align-self: flex-end;
        margin: 0 0 24px 0 !important;
    }
}</style>

<!-- End Ensighten script -->

    background-color: #191b23;
    color: #ededed;

.ensButtons {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: flex-end;
    margin-top: 15px;
}

.ensButtons .button {
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    padding: 8px 2px; /* Controls the button's height and width relative to its text content */

    color: #646464;
    margin-left: 20px;
    text-align: center;

.ensButtons .button.grey {

}

.ensButtons .button.blue {
    background-color: #2b5cac;
    color: #fff;
}

.ensButtons .button.raised {
    transition: box-shadow 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    transition-delay: 0.2s;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 5px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.26);
}

.ensButtons .button.raised:active {
    box-shadow: 0 8px 17px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    transition-delay: 0s;
}

    clear: both;
}

}

.ensModal {

.ensModal input[type="checkbox"] {
    position: absolute !important;
    height: 1px;
    width: 1px;
    overflow: hidden;
    clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
    white-space: nowrap; /* added line */

    background: #fff;
    left: 36px;
    transition: 0.5s;
}

    background: #43a047;

}

.ensModal .switch {
    display: block;
    width: 50px;
    height: 15px;
    background: #939393;
    border-radius: 10px;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    transition: 0.5s;
}

.ensModal .toggle {
    height: 17px;
    width: 17px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: white;
    position: absolute;

}
.ensButtons .button {

    height: 32px;

    font-size: 0.9em;
    background-color: #fff;
    color: #646464;
    margin-left: 20px;
}
.ensButtons .button.grey {
    background-color: #eee;
}
.ensButtons .button.blue {
    background-color: #2b5cac;
    color: #fff;
}

.ensButtons .button.raised {
    transition: box-shadow 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    transition-delay: 0.2s;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 5px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.26);
}

.ensButtons .button.raised:active {
    box-shadow: 0 8px 17px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
    transition-delay: 0s;
}

.ensModal .ensTitle {

    width: 95%;

}

.ensModal .consentDescription {
    color: #333;
    font-size: 14px;
}

.ensModal hr {
    color: #c5c5c5;
}

.ensModal .description {
    max-width: 600px;
    font-size: 12px;
    margin-top: 15px;
    clear: both;
}

.ensToggleLabel.chevron::before {
    border-style: solid;
    border-width: 2px 2px 0 0;
    content: "";
    display: inline-block;
    height: 8px;
    margin: 0 5px 2px 0;
    position: relative;
    width: 8px;
}

.ensToggleLabel.chevron.right:before {
    transform: rotate(45deg);
}

.ensToggleLabel.chevron.bottom:before {
    margin-left: 2px;
    margin-bottom: 3px;
    transform: rotate(135deg);
}

.ensModal .ensTagsContent {
    display: none;

}

.ensModal .tagContainer {

    padding: 7px 0 7px 7px;
    font-size: 15px;
}

.contactInfoLink {
    display: block;

}

.ensToggleRowWrapper {
    max-height: 400px;
    overflow: auto;
}

To manage your Cookie preferences, use the toggles below and click <b>Confirm Choices</b> when done.
